short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the currently browsed wiki for any selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this Google Chrome extension, search the currently browsed wiki for any selected text.

Simply highlight the text that you want to search, right-click to open the context menu and click on "Search this wiki for [your text]". It will either get you directly to the wiki page of interest, or to the search results if the page was not found.

Works on a wide range of wiki and fandom (formerly wikia) websites.
